description.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the opposite gender
less likely to attack.
description.emerald:
Makes the opposite gender
less likely to attack.
description.firered-leafgreen:
If it is the other
gender, the foe is
made infatuated and
unlikely to attack.

likely to attack.

effect.full: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.shortEffect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.
